LanguageData.SyrHarpy_useStandardAI: Use standard AI to look for food
LanguageData.SyrHarpy_useStandardAITooltip: Will disable the advanced AI looking for nutritious food and instead make thrumkin look for food like humans - can fix issues with food AI.
LanguageData.HarpyNeed_BloodlustBreak: This happened because: Unsatisfied bloodlust need
LanguageData.MinorBloodlustAlertDesc: These colonists have a desire to fight and if not dealt with might do so on their own:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.MajorBloodlustAlertDesc: These colonists have a critical desire to fight and may go berserk at any moment:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.HarpyFlyDescription: Allows a harpy to fly to a nearby location, range depends on wing health, cooldown on breathing capacity
LanguageData.HarpyFly_MentalState: Pawn is in a mental state
LanguageData.HarpyFly_RoofCaster: Not close enough to unroofed cell
